data.text: @jane_gana looked to me like a drunk goofy 13 year thinkung he was cool. And we know about the drinking issues growing up w/dad
@myaamiaki @EW Also how is that a mistake to touch someone inappropriately on tv without their permission.

@myaamiaki @EW What kind of grown man would do that on national tv? It was disgusting to watch and when did he apologize it wasn’t when it happened it was years later. He is very Weinsteinish cause had he been called out he didn’t plan on apologizing.
@EW mira @Gabbie. A que le buscan el lado malo a esto de estos dos.
@iloveme1779 @EW i see big hate against all men coming out &  male victims are not being treated as well as ladies double standard much?
@iloveme1779 @EW people make mistakes ben grabbed and apologized  but that doesnt put him equal to weinstein or others w/2 digit complaints
@EW Now if we can just get Hollywood to remember that Native Americans exist and our voices should be heard too

@EW I just want Ben Affleck and Matt Damon to go away, they are so problematic for the culture. Between Matt Damon’s lack of understanding any movement to Ben and Casey’s sexual predator past. How about go away forever and include that in your rider.
